welcome_message_body: Welcome to Villa Park, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all this wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for United Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for American Airlines and other major carriers

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Handles international flights for various airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international and some domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and comfortable seating areas.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Municipal Airport primarily serves regional flights and offers a smaller, more intimate travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
